name: Lawmage Project [TEST VERSION]
description:
LAWMAGE PROJECT TEST VERSION

Controls:

  • Z - Interact/Accept
  • X - Cancel/Menu
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Shift - Dash

MUST READ!!

v0.3 is now released. Please re-download the game because the previous versions had a gamebreaking bug early on in the game.

Please answer the survey AFTER playing the game:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScriXalaY02Ef2smLNW_P4Lsih3u0wYTUwIGjpZ...

  • 9 June 2019, v.03 Update - Windows version added. Fixed a bug that cannot find the book resource in the Main School Building.
